MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L11 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Storrington Avenue, Willowmeade and surrounding area.  Our emergency response team is connecting generators to the mains to restore electricity and will get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:00am on 19th March 2021.
